rows.label: bf05200100_0002
rows.name:
"No More Blades, No More War"...
What does that mean?

rows.label: bf05200100_0004
rows.name:
That's a protest against measures
the Holy See takes against Blades.

rows.label: bf05200100_0006
rows.name:
The refugees have really been going at
it since last year or so.

rows.label: bf05200100_0008
rows.name: Whoa! Where'd you come from?

rows.label: bf05200100_0010
rows.name: What'd you do, swim here?

rows.label: bf05200100_0012
rows.name: Did Blades do something wrong?

rows.label: bf05200100_0014
rows.name:
The Holy See is solely responsible
for managing the supply of Core Crytstals in every country.

rows.label: bf05200100_0016
rows.name:
Though sometimes the likes of Morph
and Bahn grab a piece of the pie.

rows.label: bf05200100_0018
rows.name: In other words, the Holy See itself is the reason for war?

rows.label: bf05200100_0020
rows.name: That's one way of looking at it, at least.

rows.label: bf05200100_0022
rows.name:
But war's about much more
than just Blades and Drivers!

rows.label: bf05200100_0024
rows.name:
I know that and you know that, but that
doesn't mean they're gonna accept it.

rows.label: bf05200100_0026
rows.name: I guess so...

rows.label: bf05200100_0028
rows.name: There's a lot of...Gulan here...

rows.label: bf05200100_0030
rows.name:
They fled the Gulan War ten years ago.
But here they are, refugees still.

rows.label: bf05200100_0032
rows.name: Yes. They're a funny old lot, you know.

rows.label: bf05200100_0034
rows.name:
We feed them, we water them, and this
is the thanks we get.

rows.label: bf05200100_0036
rows.name: Don't these ruffians know that manners cost nothing?

rows.label: bf05200100_0038
rows.name:
I swear, you lend these people a hand and
they want the whole bloody arm.

rows.label: bf05200100_0040
rows.name: It's easy to disregard things beyond your control,

rows.label: bf05200100_0042
rows.name: and direct your anger at targets closer to hand.

rows.label: bf05200100_0046
rows.name: Do you have something to say?

rows.label: bf05200100_0048
rows.name: Not really.

rows.label: bf05200100_0050
rows.name: Out with it, Rex.

rows.label: bf05200100_0060
rows.name:
Superbia's Divine Beast -
it's dying, and everybody knows it.

rows.label: bf05200100_0070
rows.name: That's why they - why you need Gula.

rows.label: bf05200100_0080
rows.name:
Our population is large.
Larger than Invidia's.

rows.label: bf05200100_0090
rows.name:
But you don't have the resources to
support all those people...

rows.label: bf05200100_0100
rows.name: You are astute for someone so young.

rows.label: bf05200100_0110
rows.name: Us salvagers pick up more than just artifacts.

rows.label: bf05200100_0120
rows.name:
I'm not daft.
I know fine words alone won't change reality.

rows.label: bf05200100_0130
rows.name: So you seek Eden.

rows.label: bf05200100_0140
rows.name: Is that wrong?

rows.label: bf05200100_0150
rows.name: No. I was just reminded how young you are.

rows.label: bf05200100_0160
rows.name:
Still, if it's Rex, or people who harp on
about justice with no solutions...

rows.label: bf05200100_0170
rows.name: I'm bettin' on Rex.

rows.label: bf05200100_0180
rows.name: I must admit, I do respect the boy's drive.

rows.label: bf05200100_0190
rows.name: Ahh, I'm just stumbling my way forward.
